mapper.select:
select empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno from ( select rownum rn, empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno from emp where
rownum <= #{page} * #{amount} and status = 'y' ) where rn > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount} order by empno desc

select count(*) from emp where
empno > 0
mapper.insert: insert into emp (empno, ename, job, mgr, hireDate, sal, comm, deptNo) values ( (select empno from ( select rownum rn, empno from emp where empno > 0 order by empno desc ) where rn = 1) + 1 , #{ename}, #{job}, #{mgr}, sysdate, #{sal}, #{comm}, #{deptNo} )
